TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TnefPart extends MimeKit.MimePart

Docs.summary: A MIME part containing Microsoft TNEF data.

remarks.para: Represents an application/ms-tnef or application/vnd.ms-tnef part.
TNEF (Transport Neutral Encapsulation Format) attachments are most often sent by Microsoft Outlook clients.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Docs.remarks: Creates a new with a Content-Type of application/vnd.ms-tnef and a Content-Disposition value of "attachment" and a filename paremeter with a value of "winmail.dat".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class MimeKit.MimeEntityConstructorInfo entity) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class MimeKit.MimeMessage ConvertToMessage() cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts the TNEF content into a .
Docs.returns: A message representing the TNEF data in MIME format.
Docs.remarks: TNEF data often contains properties that map to headers. TNEF data also often contains file attachments which will be mapped to MIME parts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class MimeKit.MimePart> ExtractAttachments() cil managed

Docs.summary: Extracts the embedded attachments from the TNEF data.
Docs.remarks: Parses the TNEF data and extracts all of the embedded file attachments.
